AlertRule.DataSubsExpr: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <QuerySpec xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://tempuri.org/ExprFormat.xsd"> <version>1</version> <v1QueryExpr node="EXPR" name="STARTS"> <args node="FIELD" name="UniqueIdentifier" /> <args node="CONST" name="String" value="Orion.Market.QR_LIVE." /> </v1QueryExpr> </QuerySpec>
AlertRule.Constraint: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <QuerySpec xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://tempuri.org/ExprFormat.xsd"> <version>1</version> <v1QueryExpr node="EXPR" name="AND"> <args node="EXPR" name="GEQ"> <args node="EXPR" name="DOW"> <args node="EXPR" name="DATE" /> </args> <args node="CONST" name="DayOfWeek" value="Monday" /> </args> <args node="EXPR" name="LEQ"> <args node="EXPR" name="DOW"> <args node="EXPR" name="DATE" /> </args> <args node="CONST" name="DayOfWeek" value="Friday" /> </args> <args node="EXPR" name="GEQ"> <args node="EXPR" name="TIME" /> <args node="CONST" name="TimeSpan" value="04:30:00" /> </args> <args node="EXPR" name="LEQ"> <args node="EXPR" name="TIME" /> <args node="CONST" name="TimeSpan" value="20:30:00" /> </args> </v1QueryExpr> </QuerySpec>
AlertRule.Condition: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <QuerySpec xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://tempuri.org/ExprFormat.xsd"> <version>1</version> <v1QueryExpr node="EXPR" name="GTR"> <args node="EXPR" name="SUB"> <args node="EXPR" name="NOW" /> <args node="FIELD" name="$ItemCreated" /> </args> <args node="CONST" name="TimeSpan" value="00:15:00" /> </v1QueryExpr> </QuerySpec>
AlertRule.SignalFormat: QR_LIVE curves (DEV) are out of date!
